concise_definition: n. 多佛（英国港口城市）

definitions.explanation_en: A historic port city in southeastern England, located on the Strait of Dover, known for its white chalk cliffs and as the closest point to continental Europe.
definitions.explanation_cn: 位于英格兰东南部、多佛尔海峡边的一座历史悠久的港口城市，以其白色悬崖和作为距欧洲大陆最近点而闻名。
definitions.example_en: The ferry from Calais arrives at Dover after a short crossing of the English Channel.
definitions.example_cn: 从加来出发的渡轮在穿越英吉利海峡后抵达多佛。
